name: Dungeons of Akazarn
description:
Journey to the tranquil town of Akazarn where you will recruit and equip your party to fight the monsters that threaten its peace!

Created as a senior capstone project in a semester.

Features:

  • 2 dungeons!
  • 6 unique classes!
  • 17 abilities!
  • 40 items!
  • Fred!
